channel.title: Scripting on Bajo el teclado
channel.description: Recent content in Scripting on Bajo el teclado

item.title: Hack The Box: Antique Writeup | Easy
item.description: Hack The Box: Antique Writeup Welcome to my detailed writeup of the easy difficulty machine “Antique” on Hack The Box. This writeup will cover the steps taken to achieve initial foothold and escalation to root. TCP Enumeration $ rustscan -a 10.129.250.207 --ulimit 5000 -g 10.129.250.207 -> [23] $ nmap -p23 10.129.250.207 -oN allPorts Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-08-05 23:18 CEST Nmap scan report for 10.129.250.207 Host is up (0.

item.title: Hack The Box: Jab Writeup | Medium
item.description: Hack The Box: Jab Writeup Welcome to my detailed writeup of the medium difficulty machine “Jab” on Hack The Box. This writeup will cover the steps taken to achieve initial foothold and escalation to root. TCP Enumeration $ rustscan -a 10.129.230.215 --ulimit 5000 -g 10.129.230.215 -> [53,88,135,139,389,445,464,593,636,3268,3269,5222,5223,5262,5263,5270,5269,7777,9389,5276,5275,5985,47001,49771,49703,49696,49694,49695,49673,49667,49666,49664,49665] $ nmap -p53,88,135,139,389,445,464,593,636,3268,3269,5222,5223,5262,5263,5270,5269,7777,9389,5276,5275,5985,47001,49771,49703,49696,49694,49695,49673,49667,49666,49664,49665 -sCV 10.129.230.215 -oN allPorts Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-08-03 19:11 CEST Stats: 0:00:31 elapsed; 0 hosts completed (1 up), 1 undergoing Service Scan Service scan Timing: About 54.

item.title: Hack The Box: SolarLab Writeup | Medium
item.description: Enumeration TCP Scan Primero descubrimos que puertos por TCP están abiertos utilizando rustscan ➜ scan rustscan -a 10.129.231.39 --ulimit 5000 -g 10.129.231.39 -> [80,135,139,445,6791,7680] Y ahora hacemos un escaneo mas exhaustivo sobre estos puertos con nmap ➜ scan nmap -p80,135,139,445,6791,7680 -sCV 10.129.231.39 -oN allPorts Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-07-27 14:28 CEST Nmap scan report for 10.129.231.39 Host is up (0.036s latency). PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 80/tcp open http nginx 1.
